product_name: Cannondale Synapse Alloy 7 Women's Bike - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Comfortable, consistent and capable, the women's Cannondale Synapse Alloy 7 road bike delivers smooth, dependable performance along with 27 gears for weekend joy rides, commuting, fitness and more.
short_description: Comfortable, consistent and capable, the women's Cannondale Synapse Alloy 7 road bike delivers smooth, dependable performance along with 27 gears for weekend joy rides, commuting, fitness and more.
